text: I have been trying to deploy the sample example02 on the local dev env... and deployment and invoke functions have worked ..but I am unable to query
Get this error : Could not get deployment transaction for mycc - LedgerError - ResourceNotFound: ledger: resource not found
Could anyone help me with this error/
<@U1T2X90HG>: the deploy and invoke functions are “submitted” for later asynch execution.The deploy did not work based on your error
it might be that you did the query too soon before the chaincode dpeloy was executed
or there might have been an error
peer’s logs would have the error
<@U0ULK2JPP>: its possible...but after I did a deploy i received a response with a hashcode in it...and then on the invoke call also received a response..
I have been looking at the console log as well.. and dont see any obvious error

How does one query the transaction history of an item in the ledger? For example, given PutState(X, Y), followed by PutState(X,Z)… is there an API for following/linking those transactions, or is that left to application level logic?
